com.soa.message

Interface ExchangeProperties


  • public interface ExchangeProperties
    Pre-defined Exchange properties.
    Since:
    6.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String AUDIT_EXCHANGE 
      static java.lang.String AUDIT_LOG_LEVEL
      Property that holds the LogLevel for auditing (if any).
      static java.lang.String EXCHANGE_STARTED_DATE_PROPERTY
      Property to hold the Date the exchange started.
      static java.lang.String EXCLUDE_FROM_TRANSACTION
      Boolean property indicating the exchange should be excluded from any running transaction.
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_TRANSACTION
      Property to hold the MessageTransaction the exchange is associated with (if any).
      static java.lang.String POSSIBLE_ENDPOINTS
      When an Exchange is created, the target endpoint may not yet be known, or the service, interface, or binding for that matter.
      static java.lang.String SECURITY_CONTEXT
      Property to hold a MultiSubjectSecuritySessionContext to represent the security context associated with the exchange.

    • Field Detail

      • POSSIBLE_ENDPOINTS

        static final java.lang.String POSSIBLE_ENDPOINTS
        When an Exchange is created, the target endpoint may not yet be known, or the service, interface, or binding for that matter. The corresponding properties of an Exchange are therefore optional. However, there may be a list of potential endpoints that are known, typically based on the protocol specific address the input message was received on. These potential endpoints can be specified using the POSSIBLE_ENDPOINTS property. The value of the property is a java.util.List of See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SECURITY_CONTEXT

        static final java.lang.String SECURITY_CONTEXT
        Property to hold a MultiSubjectSecuritySessionContext to represent the security context associated with the exchange.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MESSAGE_TRANSACTION

        static final java.lang.String MESSAGE_TRANSACTION
        Property to hold the MessageTransaction the exchange is associated with (if any).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXCLUDE_FROM_TRANSACTION

        static final java.lang.String EXCLUDE_FROM_TRANSACTION
        Boolean property indicating the exchange should be excluded from any running transaction.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        static final java.lang.String EXCHANGE_STARTED_DATE_PROPERTY
